<style>
  table td p { margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0; }
</style>

Manages an AWS DataSync Agent deployed on premises.

> **NOTE:** One of `activation_key` or `ip_address` must be provided for resource creation (agent activation). Neither is required for resource import. If using `ip_address`, this provider must be able to make an HTTP (port 80) GET request to the specified IP address from where it is running. The agent will turn off that HTTP server after activation.

> This content is derived from https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-aws/blob/master/website/docs/r/datasync_agent.html.markdown.

The following arguments are supported:

<table class="ml-6">
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th>Argument</th>
            <th>Type</th>
            <th>Description</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr>
            <td class="align-top">activation<wbr>Key</td>
            <td class="align-top"><code>string</code></td>
            <td class="align-top">{{% md %}}
(Optional) DataSync Agent activation key during resource creation. Conflicts with `ip_address`. If an `ip_address` is provided instead, the provider will retrieve the `activation_key` as part of the resource creation.

{{% /md %}}</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td class="align-top">ip<wbr>Address</td>
            <td class="align-top"><code>string</code></td>
            <td class="align-top">{{% md %}}
(Optional) DataSync Agent IP address to retrieve activation key during resource creation. Conflicts with `activation_key`. DataSync Agent must be accessible on port 80 from where the provider is running.

{{% /md %}}</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td class="align-top">name</td>
            <td class="align-top"><code>string</code></td>
            <td class="align-top">{{% md %}}
(Optional) Name of the DataSync Agent.

{{% /md %}}</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td class="align-top">tags</td>
            <td class="align-top"><code>Map&lt;<wbr>any<wbr>&gt;</code></td>
            <td class="align-top">{{% md %}}
(Optional) Key-value pairs of resource tags to assign to the DataSync Agent.

{{% /md %}}</td>
        </tr>

</table>
